Just way too cute Simon, the shirt says it all .
Soon he will join the Dark Side Luke, and you will Rule the universe
haha love the shirt, what a stud
He's quite the fisherman already and that shirt is hilarious.  I can't wait to see him land his first walleye through the ice Simon...  Thanx for sharing !!
that was just great.  get'em hooked now and hope he takes you out fishing when he's much, much older. why do I see him owning a boat before a car?
Jack will be out fishing you soon Simon. Great video.
Jack already owns a boat... his father just doesn't know it yet!!!
He is so adorable Simon. Thanks for that!  Joey
